name: docker-course
description: * `docker build -t [TAGNAME] [DOCKERFILE_LOCATION]` * `docker images` * `docker rmi [IMAGE_ID/NAME]` * `docker ps -a` * `docker rm [CONTAINER_ID/NAME]` * `docker run [username/app[:tag]]`     * `-d` - detached (default-attached)     * `-i` - input enabled     * `-t` - terminal * `docker attach [DETACHED_CONTAINER_ID/NAME]`
